main.name: Ifeoma Idoko
main.description: HOWDY!! Salaam! سلام! Ndeewo! Welcome to my site. Scroll down to learn a bit about me and see some projects I have worked on
main.bio: When I am not programming, you can find me watching investigative tv, gardening, working on a DIY project or spending time in beautiful nature. My interests include documentaries, AI and the human psyche while my personality traits involve big picture thinking, people-focused, free-spirited and a reserved nature.

resume.skillmessage: SOME OF MY SKILLS INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING

projects.title: GKeep (Clone)
projects.category: Google Keep web application clone with a dark side haha!. Cool drawer too...

projects.title: HummingBird
projects.category: On this web app, you can build a customized music visualizer by importing your own music, images and icons.

projects.title: Landing Page
projects.category: A React based landing page I created for a contest. I had fun creating this piece under pressure.

projects.title: My First
projects.category: The first project I coded. I used HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I have come a long way from here.

projects.title: MyExpenses
projects.category: Built this when I was practising my javascript. MyExpenses easily records and reconciles your income and expenses.

projects.title: Face Detection Bot
projects.category: This bot will detect the faces in an image url. I built this using React alongside and Clarifai API.
